Name: To Ward Weakness
Title: Kuki Shinobu: To Ward Weakness
Source: Reward for inviting Kuki Shinobu to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: To Ward Weakness
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1411]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1411] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S14113]</color> once.
When $[A1411], who has this card equipped, is defeated, she will not be defeated but will instead heal herself to 1 HP. (Once per Round)
If $[A1411], who has this card equipped, does not have more than 5 HP, deal +1 DMG.
(You must have $[A1411] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.
